text: I'm currently using deoplete for autocomplete, and it interferes a little with latex-to-unicode. It's usually not a problem, because my latex-to-unicode completes automatically whenever a character not in a latex command comes up like a space or delimiter, but once in a while I find myself at the end of the line and wanting to use tab. I typically have to press tab a few times to get it to work. Anyone encounter this and solve it?
